name: European Confederation of Police
membership:
ETUC - European Trade Union Confederation
ICPRA - International Conference of Police Associations
goal:
The European Confederation of Police, EuroCOP, serves as the voice of European police officers in Europe. It represents over half a million officers in 27 European countries dealing with issues ranging from cross-border police cooperation to a safer working environment for police officers on the street.

EuroCOP has four main Goals

A Social Europe for the Police
Internal Security in Europe
Safety for the Police
Solidarity and Network building
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Working Time Directive
Police Ethik Code
Stockholm Programme
Health and Safety
